hero.badge: S.E.T.A.L. – Smart Environmental Tracking and Location
hero.description: S.E.T.A.L. connects citizens with entities to solve urban waste issues. Report problems instantly, track progress in real time, and watch your community transform.
hero.imageAlt: Citizen reporting and municipal team resolving waste issues
hero.title: Clean cities start here
hero.subtitle: Report waste, track cleanups, and make your city cleaner with S.E.T.A.L.

citizenFeatures.subtitle: Your voice matters. S.E.T.A.L. gives you the tools to make a real difference in your neighborhood.

snapReport.title: Snap and report in seconds
snapReport.description: Take a photo, add a short description, and submit. Categorize your report.
snapReport.longDescription: Our intuitive interface makes reporting issues effortless. Simply capture the issue with your phone’s camera, add relevant details, select the appropriate category, and submit. The entire process takes less than a minute, allowing you to report problems without disrupting your day.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Track your report from submission to resolution with live updates.
realTimeTracking.longDescription: Stay informed every step of the way with our real-time tracking system. Receive instant notifications when your report is acknowledged, assigned to a team, in progress, and finally resolved. You’ll never wonder about the status of your submission again.

impactMap.title: City impact map
impactMap.description: Visualize all resolved issues in your area. See the collective impact of citizen participation.
impactMap.longDescription: Explore an interactive map showcasing all resolved issues in your neighborhood and across the city. Watch your community transform over time and see the tangible results of civic engagement. The map provides insights into problem areas and improvements in real time.

communityTogether.title: Community together
communityTogether.description: Join your neighbors to improve your neighborhood. Celebrate wins and see your community transform.
communityTogether.longDescription: Connect with residents who care about your neighborhood. See what others are reporting, support their submissions, and collaborate on community improvements. Together, we create stronger and more responsive communities.

liveStatus.title: Live status monitoring
liveStatus.description: S.E.T.A.L. Partners can monitor the status of each report in real time, track progress, and ensure issues are resolved efficiently.
liveStatus.longDescription: Municipal teams have access to powerful dashboards displaying all incoming reports, assigning tasks to relevant services, tracking resolution timelines, and analyzing trends. This ensures accountability and helps prioritize resources where they are needed most.

privacyProtected.title: Privacy protected
privacyProtected.description: Your personal data stays safe. Report anonymously if you prefer.
privacyProtected.longDescription: We take your privacy seriously. All reports are encrypted, and you have full control over the information you share. Choose to report anonymously or include contact details for follow-up. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties.

citizenFeatures.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

howItWorks.subtitle: From detecting an issue to resolving it – the entire process is transparent and efficient.

step1.title: Snap and report
step1.description: See waste or an urban issue? Take a photo, select a category, and submit in seconds. Your location is automatically captured.

step2.title: Assignment and operational tracking
step2.description: The report is received by the administration and assigned to an available agent. The system enables real-time tracking of movements and intervention progress.

step3.title: Issue resolved
step3.description: The team intervenes and you are notified. View before-and-after photos and rate the resolution.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to make a difference

impactStats.subtitle: Together, citizens and partners are transforming urban environments worldwide.

municipality.title: For S.E.T.A.L. Partners
municipality.subtitle: Powerful tools to manage waste efficiently

municipalityDashboard.subtitle: S.E.T.A.L. provides partners with powerful tools to manage citizen reports, optimize team workflows, and deliver measurable improvements in urban cleanliness.

centralized.title: Centralized management
centralized.description: All citizen reports in a unified dashboard. Filter, search, and manage with ease.

teamAssignment.title: Team assignment
teamAssignment.description: Automatically route waste collections to the right teams. Track workload and optimize resources.

analytics.title: Performance analytics
analytics.description: Measure response times, collection rates, and citizen satisfaction in real time.

slaTracking.title: SLA tracking
slaTracking.description: Define and monitor service-level agreements. Never miss a deadline again.

beforeAfter.subtitle: Slide to see how S.E.T.A.L. helps communities reclaim their spaces.

citizen.quote: I reported an illegal dumping site and it was cleaned up within 24 hours. Amazing!
citizen.author: Maria S.

director.quote: S.E.T.A.L. helped us reduce response times by 60% and significantly improve citizen satisfaction scores.
director.author: James Chen

beforeAfter.title: See the difference
beforeAfter.subtitle: Real transformations in our communities

forCitizens.heading: For citizens
forCitizens.description: Download the app and start reporting issues in your neighborhood today.

forMunicipalities.heading: For S.E.T.A.L. Partners
forMunicipalities.description: Contact us for a personalized quote and modernize your sanitation operations with S.E.T.A.L.

finalCTA.title: Ready to make a difference?
finalCTA.subtitle: Join thousands of citizens creating cleaner communities

footer.tagline: Connecting citizens with S.E.T.A.L. partners to build cleaner, more sustainable cities together.
